data.eml:eml: Thitarodes namnai sp. nov. and T. caligophilus sp. nov. (Lepidoptera: Hepialidae), hosts of the economically important entomopathogenic fungus Ophiocordyceps sinensis in Bhutan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maczey, Norbert, Dhendup, Kuenzang, Cannon, Paul, Hywel-Jones, Nigel, Rai, Tek Bahadur (2010): Thitarodes namnai sp. nov. and T. caligophilus sp. nov. (Lepidoptera: Hepialidae), hosts of the economically important entomopathogenic fungus Ophiocordyceps sinensis in Bhutan. Zootaxa 2412: 42-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.293953
